arts.ttl: No relief for Hammers boss Nuno as Leeds down West Ham at Elland Road
arts.sum: Brenden Aaronson and Joe Rodon score the goals as Leeds United record a 2-1 victory over West Ham United in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: 'Unacceptable mistakes' - West Ham's disaster season continues as Leeds win
arts.sum: West Ham's disastrous season continued as a devastatingly bad first 15 minutes proved critical in a 2-1 defeat to Leeds at Elland Road.

arts.ttl: Leeds v West Ham: Premier League – live updates
arts.sum: ⚽️ Updates from this 8pm BST KO at Elland Road ⚽️ Premier League table | Email John Andy Irving is a cult hero at West Ham. Ironically so far, though the club are calling out for a hero who isn’t called Jarrod Bowen. Four changes for Leeds. Lucas Perri starts in goal, Jaka Bijol, Noah Okafor and Ao Tanaka in for Karl Darlow, Pascal Struijk, Anton Stach and Jack Harrison, all benched. Darlow actually played OK v Burnley so that one is something of a shock decision. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Leeds United v West Ham United | Nuno’s Bombshell 2 West Ham line up announced
arts.sum: Pretty safe to say that West Ham fans have been dreading seeing the line up tonight in case of a repeat of head coach Nuno Espírito Santo’s brain – fart selection which resulted in a dreadful performance against Brentford. The trip north to Elland Road might be an ‘away’ fixture but really should be winnable […] Source

arts.ttl: Leeds United v West Ham United | Predictions – starting XI, goals, scoreline
arts.sum: Nuno’s Espirito Santo’s assertion that West Ham need to keep trying new things ahead of a tough away fixture at Elland Road tonight will have many Hammers fans ducking behind the sofa in anticipation of another Lopetegui-style chaos ball performance. Deploying players out of position was a hallmark of the Spaniard’s tenure as he seemed […] Source

arts.ttl: Hammers’ head coach rubbishes cash claim ahead of Leeds six pointer
arts.sum: UNLIKE Graham Potter and Julen Lopetegui before him, Nuno Espírito Santo is pretty forthright with answers to questions in the conferences that provide the overture to every Premier League fixture. When the games are only three days apart, especially after an awful Monday night performance, there isn’t much new to report and exchanges can get […] Source

arts.ttl: Leeds United vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Leeds United welcome West Ham to Elland Road on Friday night, aiming to bounce back immediately after their long unbeaten home run was ended by Tottenham last time out. Before that defeat, the Whites had gone 23 league games without losing on their own patch, a run stretching back over a year. arts.ttl: Crysencio Summerville sends warning to Leeds United ahead of Elland Road reunion
arts.sum: Crysencio Summerville returns to Elland Road this Friday night as Leeds United welcome West Ham to West Yorkshire. Leeds need to get back to winning ways this weekend, after losing away to relegation rivals Burnley 2-0 last time out. West Ham, meanwhile, come up to Elland Road looking poor at the moment and in need […] The post Crysencio Summerville sends warning to Leeds United ahead of Elland Road reunion appeared first on LeedsAllOver.

arts.ttl: All 10 Premier League weekend predictions - Week 9
arts.sum: It is another busy Premier League weekend and James Milton previews all the top flight action, offering a score prediction for all 10 games.
